text: Valer Săsărman (born 25 August 1969) is a Romanian former professional footballer who played as a defender. Săsărman started his career at Laminorul Beclean, but played for the rest of it, in 329 matches and scored 7 goals, for Gloria Bistrița. After retirement Valer Săsărman started his football manager career, going back to the same teams for which he played.Valer Săsărman, glorie a Bistriței. observatorbn.ro Astazi, Valer Sasarman, antrenorul divizionarei C Somes Gaz Beclean. mesagerul.ro Valer Săsărman este noul antrenor al Gloriei Progresul Bistrița. mesagerul.ro ==Honours== ;Gloria Bistriţa *Romanian Cup: 1993–94 ==References== ==External links== * Category:1969 births Category:Living people Category:People from Bistrița- Năsăud County Category:Romanian footballers Category:Association football defenders Category:Liga I players Category:Liga II players Category:ACF Gloria Bistrița players Category:Romanian football managers Category:ACF Gloria Bistrița managers
title: Valer Săsărman
